core

Class Direction

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Direction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Direction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Direction is POJO Plain old java object. It's basically a container of data for a direction. It has no behaviour, no parent and no implementation. It's only used as a JavaBean for the UI.
    Since:
    2017-02-04
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
